items.weapons

Class AbstractWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.weapons.AbstractWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Item, Weapon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dagger, Fist, ShortSword

    public abstract class AbstractWeapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Weapon
    The class that handles all of the getters and setters for the Weapon type, as well as the .equals() and .toString() methods.

    This abstract class implements the .getDmg() and .setDmg() statements from the Weapon interface and the .getName(), .setName(), .equals() and .toString() statements from the Item interface. It contains the protected variables dmg and name for use in the constructors of individual Weapon-type objects.

    Author:
    Dr. Cheese
